abilities.name: Ancient Wind
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before you attack) if Aerodactyl is your Active Pokémon, you may ignore all Poké-Bodies until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
